Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods Meetings & events 
Host your next business meeting, sports team or family event at our conveniently located hotel near Charleston’s airport, attractions, and industries. Enjoy flexible meeting space, modern amenities & attentive service for a seamless and productive event.
Request a proposal 
Magnolia Hall

Complete facility to accommodate board meetings, training classes or receptions. Room is deorcated with a touch of Charleston and full of natural light with a view of our preserved wetlands. The Hall opens up onto a patio leading to boardwalk and pool.

Ground Floor

75 Guests
We've got you covered

Shipping available

Skip To main content View prices View all Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods 
Important Announcements
Comfort, Convenience & Smiles in Charleston 
Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express & Suites®, conveniently located just minutes from historic Charleston, South Carolina. Situated off I-26, our hotel is within five miles of Charleston International Airport and major employers including Boeing, Bosch, and Mercedes, and in the heart of the area’s largest retail district. Enjoy walkable access to Northwoods Mall and more than a dozen nearby restaurants, all while staying at a contemporary hotel you can trust in the Lowcountry.

The Holiday Inn Express Charleston – Northwoods is designed to exceed expectations for leisure travelers and families alike. Our central location places you close to popular attractions such as Carolina Ice Palace, Cypress Gardens, Patriots Point, and historic plantations. If a beach getaway is part of your plans, Isle of Palms is just 16 miles away and Folly Beach is only 20 miles from the hotel.

Business travelers will appreciate our proximity to the Convention Center, Air Force Base, Naval Weapons Station, Palmetto Commerce, Bushy Park, and other major industry hubs. Complimentary high-speed internet access, a 24-hour business center, and a spacious meeting room make staying productive easy.

Guests also enjoy a range of complimentary amenities, including a hot breakfast, manager’s reception, fitness center, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. We look forward to welcoming you.

The highlights

Dining Nearby

Costa Bean-to-Cup Coffee - 24 hours a day

Full Hot Breakfast Included with your stay

Manager's Reception Tuesday and Wednesday

Dining Nearby

Plenty of dining options within a 5-minute walk out our front door. Amici's Italian Bistro, locally family owned and operated, Red Crab Juicy Seafood, Carraba's, Bahama Breeze, Olive Garden, Outback, Hooters, Waffle House, Wendy's and Taco Bell. Within a short drive you will find Cracker Barrel, Moe's Southwest Grille, Naan, Thai Elephant & more

Costa Bean-to-Cup Coffee - 24 hours a day

Savor the taste of freshly brewed coffee around the clock with our new bean-to-cup coffee machine, available 24/7 in the lobby. Elevate your stay with us and relish every sip of our exceptional coffee!

Full Hot Breakfast Included with your stay

We serve our full hot breakfast daily from 630am to 930am. Hot items include eggs, turkey and pork sausage, biscuits and gravy, our warm and World Famous Cinnamon Rolls, made to order pancakes, hot and cold cereals, yogurts, fruit, bread, muffins, bagels, coffee, teas, juices, milk and more. Great way to start your day!

Manager's Reception Tuesday and Wednesday

We host an evening reception Tuesday and Wednesday from 530pm to 7pm. Complimentary local craft beer, wines, sodas and snacks. Come relax, unwind and meet our management team.

FAQs for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods have a pool? 
Yes, Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods has an outdoor pool.
How much is parking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
Complimentary parking is available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods for hotel guests.
Can I bring my pet to Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
No, pets are not allowed at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods.
Can I cancel my booking at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods for a full refund? 
Always check the hotel's cancellation policy before booking a rate. Room cancellation is subject to rate booked at time of reservation and cancellation policy varies by rate.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods have a restaurant on site? 
No, there is no on site restaurant at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods.
Is there free breakfast available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
Breakfast is free with your stay at the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods.
When is breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
Breakfast at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.On weekends, breakfast is available from 6:30 AM to 9:30 AM.
Is there a complimentary shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
No, there is not a complimentary local area shuttle available at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods.
What are the check-in and check-out times for Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods? 
Check-in at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods is from 4:00 PM, and check-out time is 12:00 PM. Contact the hotel directly for options available for early check-in or late check-out.
Does Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods offer free Wi-Fi? 
Yes, the Holiday Inn Express & Suites Charleston - Northwoods offers free WiFi!
